reviews.review_text: Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 26 hours of work. Closed 14 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from the ethics module. Already made back 4x my investment.

The instructor support was exceptional. the instructor personally answered my question about intake procedures within 24 hours. The live Q&A sessions helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from teaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The client onboarding module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 9 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Decent course. The Module 2 module was fantastic, but the final module didn't deliver as much value. Wanted more interactive elements. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on group coaching. The Module 5 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.
Loved the peer feedback. Being able to discuss marketing authentically with peers who 'get it' was invaluable. The form library is something I still reference regularly. Great ongoing value.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the session templates templates alone saved me 20 hours of work. Closed 13 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from the assessment section. Already made back 3x my investment.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the referral system and saw 137% revenue increase in 90 days. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

As someone with a background in social work, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and motivational interviewing approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

I've taken 10 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 81% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 24 hours of work. Closed 8 new clients in 2 months using the pitch framework from the assessment section. Already made back 5x my investment.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from fitness training to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 11 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the assessment forms templates alone saved me 19 hours of work. Closed 14 new clients in 6 weeks using the pitch framework from Module 5. Already made back 2x my investment.

I've taken 7 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

I've taken 13 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on ethical practice helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from traditional therapy to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 7 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 136% in 2 months. Worth every penny.

I've taken 10 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 6 weeks I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

As someone with a background in psychology, I appreciated the academic rigor. The integration of person-centered and acceptance-commitment approaches was brilliant. This isn't just 'coaching tips' — it's legitimate professional training.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The real-world examples made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 111% in 90 days. Worth every penny.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 1 month after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 5. Now charging $289 per session vs $85 before. Game changer.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 11 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 2 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the consultation model from Module 3. Now charging $254 per session vs $87 before. Game changer.

Decent course. The the assessment section module was fantastic, but the final module didn't deliver as much value. Could use more real client examples. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The evidence base section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my master's program. Now I can confidently explain systems theory to clients and colleagues.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The evidence base section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my professional experience. Now I can confidently explain trauma-informed practice to clients and colleagues.

The depth of research behind this curriculum is impressive. Every claim backed by clinical research, which builds massive credibility with clients. The outcome assessment has become my go-to for intake sessions. Thoroughly evidence-based.
The case study breakdowns made all the difference. I learn best by doing, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The downloadable worksheets helped me finally understand boundary setting.

The instructor support was exceptional. Sarah personally answered my question about setting boundaries within one business day. The live Q&A sessions helped me troubleshoot real client scenarios. Never felt alone in the learning process.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 85% in 3 months. Worth every penny.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the consultation funnel and saw 63% revenue increase in 90 days. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.
